descriptionShort: Rimpelstories is ‘n leesprogram vir die Grondslagfase (Afrikaans huistaal), wat uit 88 aantreklike geïllustreerde storie- en feiteboekies bestaan.
subtitle: Petrus Padda die brandweerman Reader / Storybook (Grade 2)
title: Petrus Padda Die Brandweerman

descriptionShort: This series of unabridged Shakespeare titles is based on the premise that students can reach a clear understanding of their work only through a close and careful reading of the text. The commentary facing each page of the text has been designed to suggest a critical interpretation of the play.
title: A midsummer night's dream

seriesTitle: Kagiso Junior and Senior Desk Atlas
descriptionShort: This atlas for the Senior Phase brings the South African sub-continent into focus within the wider frame of our life on earth.
subtitle: (1ST - 1994) Atlas
title: Junior Desk Atlas

seriesTitle: Geography & Atlases: New Primary Atlas Series (Grades 4-6) & New Primary Secondary Atlas Series (Gra
descriptionShort: This series has been specifically designed to support the 1995 interim syllabus. Each atlas in the series covers the maps required at each Grade, provides systematic and thorough coverage of essential map skills, and is designed to support geography textbooks.
subtitle: Interactive atlas and map skills
title: Explore the world

descriptionShort: The explosion of racial hate and violence in a small Alabama town is viewed by a little girl whose father defends a black man accused of rape.
title: To Kill a Mockingbird

descriptionShort: One of a series of top-quality fiction for schools. These retellings of Shakespeare stories focus on  The Taming of the Shrew ,  A Midsummer Night's Dream ,  The Merchant of Venice ,  Henry IV Part 1 ,  Henry V ,  Twelfth Night ,  Julius Caesar ,  Hamlet ,  King Lear ,  Macbeth  and  The Tempest .
subtitle: Reader / Storybook
title: The Enchanted Island

descriptionShort: The Students' Companion: International Edition is an essential book that no student or teacher should be without. Part almanack, part dictionary, it is a handy encyclopaedia contained within one portable volume.
title: Student's Companion

subtitle: Reader / Storybook (Grade 1)
title: Rimpelstories: Leesreeks Vir Die Grondslagfase

descriptionShort: Features foundational truths that are suitable for new believers and those who want a refresher course in the basics of spiritual growth.
title: Every Day with Jesus for New Christians

descriptionShort: Can a good company become a great one and, if so, how? After a five-year research project, the author concludes that good to great can and does happen. Here, he uncovers the underlying variables that enable any type of organization to make the leap from good to great while other organizations remain only good.
title: Good to Great

descriptionShort: This is one a series of original stories designed for the 12 to 16 age-group. All the stories have a strong African flavour.
title: A Cageful of Butterflies

descriptionShort: In this classic Seussian tale, the good doctor primes his readers against all the little mishaps and misadventures that can befall even the best of us - from bang-ups and hang-ups to lurches and slumps - encouraging us to take life in our stride!
title: Oh, the Places You'll Go!

descriptionShort: The Bluebird foundations series has been developed by an experienced pre-school and foundation phase educator.
subtitle: Learner's workbook
title: Bluebird

descriptionShort: Unveils the author's uncommon journey to an understanding of and fellowship with the Holy Spirit. This book helps readers to discover: how to recognize the voice of the Holy Spirit; seven steps to an effective prayer life; the source and purpose of God's anointing; freedom from fear of the unpardonable sin; and, God's master plan for their lives.
title: Good Morning, Holy Spirit

descriptionShort: This revised edition of Bevere's bestselling book on how to stay free from offense features a study guide with daily or weekly discussion questions, Scriptures, prayers, action steps, and other interactive study tools for group or individual study.
subtitle: Living Free from the Deadly Trap of Offense
title: The Bait of Satan

descriptionShort: A resource for all those seeking guidance and wisdom for their lives, this Bible features an easy-to-access style to help anyone seeking inspiration from the Scriptures.
title: Text Bible-NKJV

descriptionShort: This interactive business book provides individuals, managers and organisations with personalised tools to identify their talents and succeed at every level.
subtitle: How to Develop Your Talents and Those of the People You Manage
title: Now, Discover Your Strengths: How to Develop Your Talents and Those of the People You Manage

descriptionShort: English in context is a way for learners to discover the colourful varieties of English language in use in South Africa today, and to understand them as they are set against the broader perspective of English as a universal language.
subtitle: (Gr 7: Learner's Book)
title: English in context

subtitle: A Comprehensive Guide
title: Christian Counseling

descriptionShort: Useful for first-level psychology students, this collection of study units provides information about specific topics. It features units that work independently of each other and can be interchanged or omitted as needed. It includes chapters on: cognition
title: A student's A-Z of psychology

descriptionShort: Experiencing Father's Embrace is an excellent resource for anyone interested in growing or ministering in the Father's love message. The author's style of writing makes this book easy to read, yet it is one of the most thorough and profoundly impacting books available on knowing God as a Father.
title: Experiencing Father's Embrace

descriptionShort: This is a title about a many-sided man whose legacy is his unquenchable desire to spend himself for the well-being of others.
subtitle: Leadership Lessons from Nelson Mandela
title: Leading Like Madiba

descriptionShort: Worry, doubt, confusion, depression, anger and feelings of   condemnation...all these are attacks on the mind.  If you   suffer from negative thoughts, Joyce Meyer can help you win these all-   important battles
subtitle: Winning the Battle in Your Mind
title: Battlefield of the Mind: Winning the Battle in Your Mind

descriptionShort: Designed to help readers explore and understand their workplace skills and competencies, career motives and values. This book includes information about career development, a description of the eight career anchors categories, and an interview section that helps readers to analyze their career history.
title: Career Anchors Participants Workbook [With Self-Assessment Book]

descriptionShort: Chock full of action suggestions and real-life stories,
is a strategic guide that will help men and women move beyond mistakes to fulfill their potential and achieve success.
subtitle: Turning Mistakes Into Stepping Stones for Success
title: Failing Forward

subtitle: A New and Upgraded Edition of the Online Test from Gallup's Now, Discover Your Strengths (with Access Code)
title: Strengths Finder 2.0

descriptionShort: Features memoir of former KPMG CEO Eugene O'Kelley, completed in the three-and-a-half months between his diagnosis with brain cancer and his death in September 2005. This title reminds us to embrace the fragile, fleeting moments of our lives - the brief time we have with our family, our friends, and even ourselves.
subtitle: How My Forthcoming Death Transformed My Life
title: Chasing Daylight

descriptionShort: Shows the authors passion for knowledge and sense of fun. This work features revealing pieces that spans his lifetime of enthusiasm for discovering what makes the world tick - including tales of early student experiments; safe cracking and outwitting US censors during the Second World War; and his first lecture as a graduate student.
subtitle: The Best Short Works of Richard P
title: Pleasure of Finding Things Out

descriptionShort: Contemporary / British English It is 1942 in Holland and the Germans have invaded. All Jewish people are frightened for their lives, so the Frank family hide. Life is dangerous but they hope for the best   until they are finally discovered. Anne Frank was a real person, and this is her diary.
title: The Diary of a Young Girl : Level 4

descriptionShort: Exploring the controversial science of diet and health,  Good Calories, Bad Calories  is a tour de force of scientific investigation certain to redefine the ongoing debate about food and its effects on health.
subtitle: Fats, Carbs, and the Controversial Science of Diet and Health
title: Good Calories, Bad Calories: Fats, Carbs, and the Controversial Science of Diet and Health

descriptionShort: Forty years ago, Harriet Vanger disappeared from a family gathering on the island owned and inhabited by the powerful Vanger clan. Her body was never found, yet her uncle is convinced it was murder - and that the killer is a member of his own tightly knit but dysfunctional family
title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo

subtitle: Making a Heart-To-Heart Connection
title: Loving Our Kids on Purpose

descriptionShort: The second instalment in the Millennium Trilogy sees Lisbeth Salander wanted for murder while Blomkvist tries desperately to clear her name.
title: The Girl Who Played with Fire

descriptionShort: Warren Wiersbe expounds on the Epistle to the Galatians and its central, liberating message of freedom in Christ.
subtitle: NT Commentary Galatians
title: Be Free: Exchange Legalism for True Spirituality

descriptionShort: The Maskew Miller Longman Literature Study Guides offer the best support for the 2009 approved Grade 12 literature tiles. Features of the literature study guides include:&lt;p&gt; &lt;li&gt;Summaries for every chapter or scene to help learners understand the plot easily  &lt;li&gt;Comprehensive notes to build learners’ understanding and enable them to answer questions on language and style &lt;li&gt;Glossaries of difficult words and literature terms to assist learners &lt;li&gt;Exam questions to give learners practice in the skills they need to succeed &lt;li&gt;Model answers to provide learners with guidance on how to answer exam questions

Leadership 101: What Every Leader Needs to Know

descriptionShort: Prescr Psychology in the Work Context 4e is a thorough introductory text for students of industrial and organisational (IO) psychology. The book provides a comprehensive conceptual framework for understanding work behaviour and relationships at work.
title: Psychology in the Work Context

descriptionShort: #1 New York Times bestselling author, Joyce Meyer, helps readers explore the multiple and varied ways in which God is speaking in their lives.
title: How to Hear from God: Learn to Know His Voice and Make Right Decisions

descriptionShort: Lisbeth Salander confronts political corruption from her hospital bed while a killer lurks next door...
title: The Girl Who Kicked the Hornets' Nest

descriptionShort: A charming, moving account of one man's race to save a herd of elephants.
title: The Elephant Whisperer: Learning About Life, Loyalty and Freedom From a Remarkable Herd of Elephants

descriptionShort: Die HAT Skoolwoordeboek bevat meer as 30 000 woorde en uitdrukkings, duisende voorbeeldsinne en -frases, meer as 300 illustrasies, sinonieme, antonieme, inligting oor die herkoms van woorde, intensiewe vorme, manlike en vroulike vorme, afkortings en terme
title: HAT Afrikaanse skoolwoordeboek

subtitle: The Ultimate Diet for Shedding Weight and Feeling Great
title: New Atkins for a New You

descriptionShort: Sixteen-year-old Katniss Everdeen regards it as a death sentence when she is forced to represent her district in the annual Hunger Games, a fight to the death on live TV. But Katniss has been close to death before - and survival, for her, is second nature.
title: The Hunger Games

descriptionShort: The focus of this babycare book with its accessible tone remain the three most common concerns of parents in their baby's first year: Why is my baby crying? How can I get my baby to sleep well? How can I enhance my baby's development?
title: Baby Sense: Understanding Your Baby's Sensory World - the Key to a Contented Child

subtitle: A Little Boy's Astounding Story of His Trip to Heaven and Back
title: Heaven Is for Real

subtitle: The Fascinating History of Its Writing, Translation & Effect on Civilization
title: The Story of the Bible

descriptionShort: Shows that, by mastering a few tricks and being organized and focused in the kitchen, it is absolutely possible, and easy, to get a complete meal on the table in the same amount of time you'd normally spend making one dish.
title: Jamie's 30-Minute Meals

descriptionShort: The best, greatest, craziest, biggest, and funniest - Awesome South Africa will intrigue you, make you laugh, astonish and astound you. Packed full of information, colourful graphics and photographs, this entertaining compilation contains interesting fact
subtitle: The best, greatest, craziest, biggest and funniest
title: Awesome South Africa

subtitle: When Tragedy Confronts Eternity
title: The Shack

descriptionShort: Marketing Success Stories 7th edition is a South African narrative edition covering the strategies of well-known local companies that have, through a range of marketing interventions, repositioned themselves or grown market share. The book not only covers the key aspects of the marketing mix, but also includes other issues such as innovation, advertising, and product development.
title: Marketing Success Stories

descriptionShort: Gunsteling Bybelstories vir kinders bevat 15 bekende Bybelverhale, oorvertel deur Maretha Maartens. Dit verteenwoordig 'n verskeidenheid stories uit die Ou en Nuwe Testament.
title: Gunsteling Bybelstories vir kinders

descriptionShort: Set in a dark vision of near future a terrifying reality TV show is taking place. Twelve boys and twelve girls are forced to appear in a live event called The Hunger Games. There is only one rule: kill or be killed. When sixteen-year-old Katniss Everdee steps forward to take her younger sister's place in the games, she sees it as a death sentence.
title: The Hunger Games Trilogy Box Set

descriptionShort: It's a vanished and unjust world: Jackson, Mississippi, 1962. There's Aibileen, raising her seventeenth white child and nursing the hurt caused by her own son's tragic death; Minny, whose cooking is nearly as sassy as her tongue; and, white Miss Skeeter, home from College, who wants to know why her beloved maid has disappeared.
title: The Help. Kathryn Stockett

subtitle: 200 Simple and Delicious Low-Carb Recipes in 30 Minutes or Less
title: The New Atkins for a New You Cookbook: 200 Simple and Delicious Low-Carb Recipes in 30 Minutes or Less

subtitle: My Journey
title: Victor
The 5 Levels of Leadership: Proven Steps to Maximise Your Potential

subtitle: And What to Do about It
title: Why We Get Fat

subtitle: The Groundbreaking New Strengths Assessment from the Leader of the Strengths Revolution
title: Standout: The Groundbreaking New Strengths Assessment from the Leader of the Strengths Revolution

subtitle: The Exclusive Biography
title: Steve Jobs

subtitle: Book Two of the Inn Boonsboro Trilogy
title: The Last Boyfriend

subtitle: The Truth about Sex, Friendship, and Life Together
title: Real Marriage: The Truth About Sex, Friendship, and Life Together

descriptionShort: Daunted by the dark secrets of the tormented young entrepreneur Christian Grey, Ana Steele has broken off their relationship to start a new career with a US publishing house. But desire for Grey still dominates her every waking thought, and when he proposes a new arrangement, she cannot resist.
title: Fifty Shades Darker

descriptionShort: When Ana Steele first encountered the driven, damaged entrepreneur Christian Grey, it sparked a sensual affair that changed both their lives irrevocably. Ana always knew that loving her Fifty Shades would not be easy, and being together poses challenges neither of them had anticipated.
title: Fifty Shades Freed

descriptionShort: When literature student Anastasia Steele interviews successful entrepreneur Christian Grey, she finds him very attractive and deeply intimidating. Convinced that their meeting went badly, she tries to put him out of her mind - until he turns up at the store where she works part-time, and invites her out.
title: Fifty Shades of Grey
